name: Create a new workspace with invalid name -- @1.2 Invalid name workspace

steps.name: Given I set up a "POST" request to "/my/workspaces" endpoint
And I set up the data
Then I get a "400" status code as response
And I should see a messages error: One or more request parameters was missing or invalid.

parameters.name: invalid_name
parameters.value: Workspace with name big not accept

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Negative test of "workspace". Create and Update a workspace.
